item.title: XxKanexX Animator(mod)
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

lol this is brill…[quote=“Martin, post:7, topic:22997”][quote author=yakman link=topic=35102.msg423844#msg423844 date=1163038545]
if you want more ideas, try putting it in a edit box on a form ;D
[/quote]

Lol i tried this but the spaces mess up and it ends up just getting wierd looking

Incase your wondering about the memo box its the only way I could get mutiline

[scar]
program OmFG;
var
frmDesign : TForm;
Memo1 : TMemo;

procedure Formy;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 250;
frmDesign.Top := 114;
frmDesign.Width := 306;
frmDesign.Height := 291;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘frmDesign’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := false;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Memo1 := TMemo.Create(frmDesign);
Memo1.Parent := frmDesign;
Memo1.Left := 43;
Memo1.Top := 44;
Memo1.Width := 202;
Memo1.Height := 153;
Memo1.Lines.Add(’’)
Memo1.Lines.Add(’’)
Memo1.Lines.Add(’’)
Memo1.Lines.Add(’ O’)
Memo1.Lines.Add(’ /|/’)
Memo1.Lines.Add(’ O --| ‘)
Memo1.Lines.Add(’ |_/\ / ')
Memo1.TabOrder := 8;

end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘Formy’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

begin
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
end.

[/scar][/quote]

make it like this and then make it longer into like 5mins and sell pic sex!!!

Read full topic

item.title: XxKanexX Animator(mod)
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

yakman:

if you want more ideas, try putting it in a edit box on a form ;D

Lol i tried this but the spaces mess up and it ends up just getting wierd looking

Incase your wondering about the memo box its the only way I could get mutiline

[scar]
program OmFG;
var
frmDesign : TForm;
Memo1 : TMemo;

procedure Formy;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 250;
frmDesign.Top := 114;
frmDesign.Width := 306;
frmDesign.Height := 291;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘frmDesign’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := false;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Memo1 := TMemo.Create(frmDesign);
Memo1.Parent := frmDesign;
Memo1.Left := 43;
Memo1.Top := 44;
Memo1.Width := 202;
Memo1.Height := 153;
Memo1.Lines.Add(’’)
Memo1.Lines.Add(’’)
Memo1.Lines.Add(’’)
Memo1.Lines.Add(’ O’)
Memo1.Lines.Add(’ /|/’)
Memo1.Lines.Add(’ O --| ‘)
Memo1.Lines.Add(’ |_/\ / ')
Memo1.TabOrder := 8;

end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘Formy’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

begin
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
end.

[/scar]

item.title: XxKanexX Animator(mod)
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

This is a modification of anim.scar from Kanes SCAR’ness

You can tell how bored i was :rolleyes:
[scar]
const
ManyBums = 20;

var
Clear, counter:Integer;

procedure WA;
begin
wait(200);//Wait
cleardebug
end;

Procedure dead;
begin
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ O’)
Writeln(’ /|/’)
Writeln(’ O --| ‘)
Writeln(’ |/\ / ‘)
WA;
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ O’)
Writeln(’ /|/’)
Writeln(’ --| ')
Writeln('0__/\ / ‘)
WA;
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ ShiiiiiT! ‘)
Writeln(’ ‘)
Writeln(’ O’)
Writeln(’ /|/’)
Writeln(’ --| ')
Writeln('X___/\ / ')
wait(500)
End;

Procedure Alive;
begin
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ O’)
Writeln(’ __O |/’)
Writeln(’ | --| ‘)
Writeln(’ |\ / ‘)
WA;
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ O O’)
Writeln(’ \| |/’)
Writeln(’ | --| ‘)
Writeln(’ |\ / ‘)
WA;
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ Thanks Babe!’)
Writeln(’ / ‘)
Writeln(’ O O’)
Writeln(’ |/ |/’)
Writeln(’ | --| ‘)
Writeln(’ / \ / ‘)
Wait(500);
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ Any Time!’)
Writeln(’ /’)
Writeln(’ O O’)
Writeln(’|/ |/’)
Writeln(’ | | ‘)
Writeln(’/ \ / ')
Wait(500);
end;

Procedure Bend;
Begin
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ O O’)
Writeln(’ |/ |/’)
Writeln(’ | | ‘)
Writeln(’ / \ / ‘)
WA;
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ O O’)
Writeln(’ |/ |/’)
Writeln(’ | | ‘)
Writeln(’ / \ / ‘)
WA;
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ O O’)
Writeln(’ |/ |/’)
Writeln(’ | | ‘)
Writeln(’ / \ / ‘)
WA;
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ O O’)
Writeln(’ |/ |/’)
Writeln(’ | | ‘)
Writeln(’ / \ / ‘)
WA;
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ O O’)
Writeln(’ |/ |/’)
Writeln(’ | | ‘)
Writeln(’ / \ / ‘)
WA;
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’ ‘)
Writeln(’ ‘)
Writeln(’ ‘)
Writeln(’ O O’)
Writeln(’ |/ |/’)
Writeln(’ | | ‘)
Writeln(’ / \ / ‘)
WA;
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ O O’)
Writeln(’ |/ |/’)
Writeln(’ | | ‘)
Writeln(’ / \ / ‘)
WA;
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ O O’)
Writeln(’ |/ |/’)
Writeln(’ | /| ‘)
Writeln(’ / \ / ‘)
WA;
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ O O’)
Writeln(’ |/ |/’)
Writeln(’ | -| ‘)
Writeln(’ / \ / ‘)
WA;
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ O O’)
Writeln(’ |/ |/’)
Writeln(’ | --| ‘)
Writeln(’ / \ / ‘)
WA;
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ O O’)
Writeln(’ \| |/’)
Writeln(’ | --| ‘)
Writeln(’ |\ / ‘)
WA;
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ O’)
Writeln(’ __O |/’)
Writeln(’ | --| ‘)
Writeln(’ |\ / ')
WA;
end;

Procedure fuked;
begin
Repeat
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ O’)
Writeln(’ /|/’)
Writeln(’ O____8–| ‘)
Writeln(’ | | / ‘)
Wa;
For Clear:=0 To 32 Do
writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’ O’)
Writeln(’ /|/’)
Writeln(’ 0____8-| ‘)
Writeln(’ | | / ')
WA;
counter := counter+1
until(counter = ManyBums)
end;

begin
bend;
fuked;
If counter > 19 then dead else alive;
Wait(1000)
END.
[/scar]
